description:
Visquez`s Raichu battled a Trainer`s Hypno during a gym battle at the Vermilion City Gym just before Ash Ketchum arrived. It defeated the Hypno with its most powerful attack, Volt Tackle. Raichu is Visquez`s compatriot and was personally trained by Lt. Surge.
The combination of Pikachu and Ash`s Gengar during the Pok√©mon World Championships match was too much for it and it was defeated.
name: Raichuu (Visquez)
